title: Did the one-day stay of Melania Trump at the Cairo Hotel cost the United States Government $95,000?
subtitle: Some news reports have obtained some important wrong details about the Ministry of Foreign Affairs' payment to the Sirmias Intercontinental Hotel in October 2018.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: A one-day stay of the First Lady (Melania Trump) at a hotel in Cairo cost the U.S. government $9550.
